metadata.title: CVE-2015-2268 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: filter/urltolink/filter.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.9,2.7.x before 2.7.6, and 2.8.x before 2.8.4 allows remote authenticatedusers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption or partial outage) viaa crafted string that is matched against an improper regular expression.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
